palaeoSig

PalaeoSig includes the methods developed in Telford and Birks (2011) for testing the significance of transfer function reconstructions.

Installation

You can install the released version of palaeoSig from CRAN with:

install.packages("palaeoSig")

And the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("richardjtelford/palaeoSig")
